sect2.title: Installation of fam
sect2.para: Install fam by running the following commands:

note.para: You will get warnings about make install being unable to merge entries in /etc/rpc. These can be ignored, along with any IMON or inetd.conf warnings, as we will be configuring these files after installation.

screen.userinput: patch -Np1 -i ../fam-dnotify.patch && patch -Np1 -i ../fam-gcc3.patch && libtoolize --force && aclocal && automake --add-missing && autoconf && ./configure --prefix=/usr --sysconfdir=/etc && make && make install
